text: Yvette Alloo (21 June 1930 â€“ 23 September 2020) was a Belgian Paralympic table tennis player. She was the first Belgian to win a gold medal at a Paralympic Games. She was born in Brussels, Belgium. Alloo died on 23 September 2020 in Brussels, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Belgium Category:Sportspeople from Brussels Category:Table tennis players Category:Belgian sportspeople with disabilities
title: Yvette Alloo
